--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (One word Booker T and the Alliance are a bunch of no-talent losers: 
> spinerooni.)
> 
> Otyebis Military:
> 
> 
> 
> The fleshlings payed no attnetion to the Cybertronians, completing 
loading up 
> the Autobots, sealing the hatch, and powering engines.


::Redhot::

    The red and black seeker raised his hand and tapped a magic 
wand...er...pulled his arm mounted lazers into position. 
    'It's not nice to intrude uninvited!!" he screached, quite 
prepared to do battle despite his non-lethal insticts. He just wanted 
to scare them, not down their..whatever their vehical was! ~You don't 
just run off with guests~ Redhot thought angerly and said so. Loudly. 
While aiming. He let out a few blasts near the ship as a warning. Only 
he knew they wouldn't do any SERIOUS damage. 
    ~Heeeeyyyyy!~ he thought angerly to himself. ~Guns aen't exactly 
FRIENDLY~ With that he lowered his guns and helplessly watched as his 
friends were carted off.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
